isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9200, 9300, 9400 Models Built After January 1, 1995 - POWER DISTRIBUTION & GROUND SYSTEM - OPERATION - Vehicle Ground System

svcproc.title: Vehicle Ground System
svcproc.para: The engine, frame, cab and negative battery terminals are electrically connected by ground cables, which provide common ground points (studs or ground adapters). Refer to 12V POWER DISTRIBUTION- GROUND ADAPTER COMPOSITE and GROUND STUD COMPOSITE circuit diagrams, in CTS-5119S for ground composites.
